steps.description: Coat -Coat a 6-oz. ramekin cup with cooking spray

errors.description: Coating a large bowl instead of 6-oz ramekin cup

steps.description: Pour-Pour 1 egg into the ramekin cup

errors.description: Cracking an egg such that it spills on the kitchen top and floor and clean it
Cracking another egg thus making a measurement error

steps.description: Cut -Cut the English muffin into two pieces with a knife

errors.description: Cut the muffin improperly such that it results into 3 pieces

steps.description: Microwave-Microwave the ramekin cup uncovered on high for 30 seconds
Microwave -Continue to Microwave for 15-30 more seconds or until the egg is almost set
Line -Line the bottom piece of the English muffin with lettuce
sprinkle -sprinkle 1 tablespoon of cheese on cup
Microwave -Microwave just until cheese melts, about 10 seconds
replace -replace the top of the English muffin
steps.modified_description: add and replace - add contents of the bowl to the lettuce and replace the top of the English muffin

errors.description: Top -Top cup with 1 tablespoon of salsa
Place -Place the egg from the cup over the lettuce
